problem_text: For trapezoid T R S V, M and N are midpoints of the legs. If T R = 32 and M N = 25, find V S.
compact_text: For trapezoid TRSV, M and N are midpoints of the legs. If TR = 32 and MN = 25, find VS.
annotat_text: For trapezoid $T R S V, M$ and $N$ are midpoints of the legs. If $T R=32$ and $M N=25,$ find $V S$
